info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 03 at 5:57PM EDT until June 03 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Greene County in southwestern Pennsylvania... Northwestern Monongalia County in northern West Virginia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 557 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waynesburg, moving southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Blacksville, Spraggs, New Freeport, Wana, Brave, Wadestown, Daybrook, and Pentress. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
